templatetags Package¶

feedtags Module¶

openassembly.pirate_social.templatetags.feedtags.pp_get_feed(context, nodelist, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

This function get’s recent feeds from a user’s Subscriptions, with minimal unnecessary database calls. This function could be further optimized however. {% pp_get_feed user=request.user %}

{% for f in pp_feed.feed %}
{{f}}

{% endfor %}

{% endpp_get_feed %}
